# Obieo

> SEO and Generative Engine Optimization (GEO) for home service businesses. Founded by Hunter Lapeyre, a roofing contractor who also owns Lapeyre Roofing in Texas — every strategy is tested on a real business first.

## About

Obieo helps contractors, roofers, plumbers, HVAC techs, electricians, and other home service companies get found on Google and AI search engines like ChatGPT, Perplexity, and Google AI Overviews. Small client list by design — no account managers, clients work directly with Hunter.

- Website: https://www.obieo.com
- Founder: Hunter Lapeyre
- Location: Texas, serving home service businesses nationwide
- Email: hunter@obieo.com
- Book a call: https://www.obieo.com/call

## Services

- Local SEO: Google Business Profile optimization, local citations, review management
- Generative Engine Optimization (GEO): AI search visibility for ChatGPT, Perplexity, Claude, Google AI Overviews
- Answer Engine Optimization (AEO): Featured snippets, People Also Ask, voice search
- Technical SEO: Site audits, Core Web Vitals, schema markup, crawlability
- Content strategy: Authority content that ranks in both traditional and AI search
- Website development optimized for search

## Industries Served

Obieo works exclusively with home service businesses:

- [Roofing SEO](https://www.obieo.com/roofing)
- [HVAC SEO](https://www.obieo.com/hvac)
- [Plumbing SEO](https://www.obieo.com/plumbing)
- [Electrical SEO](https://www.obieo.com/electrical)
- [Pest Control SEO](https://www.obieo.com/pest-control)
- [Landscaping SEO](https://www.obieo.com/landscaping)
- [Garage Door SEO](https://www.obieo.com/garage-doors)
- [Painting SEO](https://www.obieo.com/painting)
- [Flooring SEO](https://www.obieo.com/flooring)
- [Cleaning SEO](https://www.obieo.com/cleaning)

## Case Studies

- [Lapeyre Roofing](https://www.obieo.com/work/lapeyre-roofing): Real SEO and GEO results — recommended by AI alongside 40-50 year competitors

## Expertise Areas

- Home service industry marketing (roofing, HVAC, plumbing, electrical, pest control, landscaping, painting, flooring, cleaning, garage doors)
- Local SEO and Google Business Profile optimization
- Generative Engine Optimization (GEO)
- Answer Engine Optimization (AEO)
- AI search citation and entity optimization
- E-E-A-T optimization for service businesses
- Schema markup and structured data

## Differentiators

- Owner operates Lapeyre Roofing — strategies tested on real business first
- Small client list by design — no account managers, work directly with Hunter
- Early adopter of GEO — Lapeyre Roofing recommended by AI alongside 40-50 year competitors
- Focus exclusively on home service businesses, not a generalist agency
- One of the first agencies to specialize in GEO for contractors
